name: @rtaa/asr-worker
description: Streaming ASR worker for Agent Assist platform

scripts.prebuild: npm run validate:env || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Environment validation skipped (non-blocking)'
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && (tsc -p tsconfig.json 2>&1 | tee /tmp/tsc-output.log || (echo '‚ùå TypeScript compilation failed' && cat /tmp/tsc-output.log 2>/dev/null || true && exit 1)) && (echo 'üìã TypeScript compilation output:' && ls -la dist/ 2>/dev/null | head -10 || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  dist/ is empty or missing')
scripts.build:lib: cd ../../lib/pubsub && tsc && echo '‚úÖ Compiled lib/pubsub' || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  lib/pubsub compilation skipped'
scripts.postbuild: npm run fix:paths && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function moveFiles(srcDir, destDir) { if(!fs.existsSync(srcDir)) return; const files=fs.readdirSync(srcDir); files.forEach(f=>{ const srcPath=path.join(srcDir,f); const destPath=path.join(destDir,f); if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()) { if(f!=='node_modules' && f!=='lib' && f!=='services') { moveFiles(srcPath, destDir); } } else if(f.endsWith('.js') || f.endsWith('.d.ts') || f.endsWith('.map')) { if(!fs.existsSync(destPath) || srcPath!==destPath) { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath); } } }); } function findNestedDir(dir) { if(!fs.existsSync(dir)) return null; const files=fs.readdirSync(dir); for(const f of files) { const p=path.join(dir,f); if(fs.statSync(p).isDirectory() && (f==='services' || f==='src')) { const nested=findNestedDir(p); if(nested) return nested; return p; } } return null; } function findIndexJs(dir) { if(!fs.existsSync(dir)) return null; const files=fs.readdirSync(dir); for(const f of files) { const p=path.join(dir,f); if(fs.statSync(p).isFile() && f==='index.js') return p; if(fs.statSync(p).isDirectory()) { const found=findIndexJs(p); if(found) return found; } } return null; } const nested=findNestedDir('dist'); if(nested && nested!=='dist') { moveFiles(nested,'dist'); fs.rmSync(nested,{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('‚úÖ Moved compiled files to dist/'); } const indexPath=findIndexJs('dist'); if(indexPath && indexPath!=='dist/index.js') { const destPath='dist/index.js'; fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(destPath),{recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(indexPath,destPath); console.log('‚úÖ Found and moved index.js to dist/'); } if(!fs.existsSync('dist/index.js')) { console.error('‚ùå Build failed: dist/index.js not found'); console.error('Dist contents:', fs.existsSync('dist') ? fs.readdirSync('dist').join(', ') : 'dist/ does not exist'); process.exit(1); } console.log('‚úÖ Build successful: dist/index.js exists');"
scripts.fix:paths: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function fixFile(filePath) { if(!fs.existsSync(filePath)) return; let content=fs.readFileSync(filePath,'utf8'); let changed=false; const fixes=[{from:/require\(['\"]@rtaa\/pubsub['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist\")'},{from:/require\(['\"]@rtaa\/pubsub\/topics['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist/topics\")'},{from:/require\(['\"]\.\.\/\.\.\/\.\.\/lib\/pubsub['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist\")'},{from:/require\(['\"]\.\.\/\.\.\/lib\/pubsub\/dist['\"]\)/g,to:'require(\"../../../lib/pubsub/dist\")'}]; fixes.forEach(f=>{const newContent=content.replace(f.from,f.to); if(newContent!==content){content=newContent;changed=true;} }); if(changed) fs.writeFileSync(filePath,content); } function walk(dir) { fs.readdirSync(dir).forEach(f=>{ const p=path.join(dir,f); if(fs.statSync(p).isDirectory()) walk(p); else if(f.endsWith('.js')) fixFile(p); }); } if(fs.existsSync('dist')) walk('dist'); console.log('‚úÖ Fixed import paths');"
scripts.validate:env: node -e "const required=['REDIS_URL','PUBSUB_ADAPTER']; const missing=required.filter(r=>!process.env[r]); if(missing.length && process.env.NODE_ENV==='production') { console.error('‚ùå Missing required env vars:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else if(missing.length) { console.warn('‚ö†Ô∏è  Missing env vars (dev mode):', missing.join(', ')); }"
